name: Screechers of the Marble Crows
description: Hailing from the harsh Marble Desert, the Screechers of the Marble Crows are known as handlers, friends of candescent crows, and have since developed a sixth sense to detect nearby magic use. Now finished uncovering the origin of the Clouddrop wisps, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
